title: Hijab-wearing model signs contract with PREMIUM model agency (photos) ▷ NAIJ.COM
text: - A Muslim model is “opening doors” in the U.S. - She signed a contract with the famous IMG agency - Her signature appearances in front of the camera or stage is that she always wears her hijab A Somalian-American lady, Halima Aden, who has decided to pursue a modelling career wearing her hijab, has signed a contract with the important IMG model agency. Furthermore, the 19-year-old participated in Kanye West's Yeezy Season 7 at the New York Fashion Week last week, while wearing a hijab. Aden was the first Muslim to compete in a beauty pageant in the U.S. She participated with a hijab at last year’s Miss Minnesota contest. PAY ATTENTION : Get all the latest gossips on NAIJ Gossip App This girl, born in a Kenyan refugee camp, has seen her career successfully go forward, signing on to one of the top modeling agencies in the world. She shot the cover of CR Fashion book with Mario Sorrenti as well, apart from her NYFW stint. READ ALSO : Kenyan refugee is 1st hijab-wearing model at Kanye West's show (photos) She posted a sweet note on her Instagram page, saying that "I never thought I would see the day that a woman dressed like me would grace the cover of a fashion magazine. Thank you SO much @carineroitfeld and my new @crfashionbook family for giving me the opportunity to feel represented in the most beautiful way ❤️" At Kanye West's show. Aden on her part, told followers on her account, @kinglimaa, to never “change yourself… change the game.” She also thanked the U.S. pageant for opening her “the door”, and commented how excited she was to join IMG Models. Awesome!
